name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Measured Thickness (Depth) for Squamous Cell Carcinoma
notes:
**Note 1**:  Code measured thickness (depth) of tumor, not size, diameter, or any other measurement.  Record actual measurement to nearest hundredth of millimeter (mm) from pathology report.

**Note 2**:  Record only for squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid.  For other histologies use code 987, not applicable.
rows:
0.01 9.79 millimeters (mm)
(Exact depth to nearest hundredth of mm)

Examples:
    001    0.01 mm
    002    0.02 mm
    010    0.1 mm
    074    0.74 mm
    100    1 mm
    105    1.05 mm
    979    9.79 mm
Not applicable, not squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)

Microinvasion
Microscopic focus or foci only and no depth given
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information 
Not documented in patient record
